Reviews.Title: Canon G16 is great, this package is value
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: The package actually do not look like the image. The case in the picture is not Digpro Deluxe Case (title told that). But this still is a value package.This package include:- Canon PowerShot G16- 32GB Secure Digital High Speed Memory Card- Digpro Deluxe Case- Extra Battery- Card Reader- Tripod- Card Wallet- HDMI Cable- Screen ProI also buy more battery here:B0065MMKTGand new case:B003CJTQJC

Reviews.Title: Canon G16
Reviews.Author: Serena Mehra "Rena"
Reviews.Content: Great camera, good pics, light and easy to carry. I wish the wifi was easier. They made it sound v easy. Uploading pictures is cumbersome :(Otherwise, I would recommend it. Great night shots.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: R. Oppor
Reviews.Content: amazing camera - I have both this and a SLR and since  I purchased this camera I hardly use the canon Rebel.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds my expectations
Reviews.Author: Jim Crow
Reviews.Content: The G16, for my needs, is the perfect point and shoot. It's focus is fast enough that the lag mentioned in the reviews I read is unnoticeable in actual use. The f1.8 aperture allows excellent available candid shots. This camera handles mixed lighting better than any I have used giving very good color and skin tones. I have never been a fan of on camera flashes and so was very pleased with the performance of the G16's pop up unit. It did not overpower the ambient light and gave near perfect fill in lighting. The optical viewfinder, which was the primary reason that I wanted a new camera, is acceptable for use on shots that do not require critical framing. The G16 will be a welcome addition to my camera battery, nudging my SX110 aside (the SX will still ride along in the Maxpedition shoulder bag that I carry daily) for inside shots. Neither can or will replace my digital SLR and lens assortment for my "serious" imaging.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Camera
Reviews.Author: P. Day
Reviews.Content: This is the best "point and shoot" camera we have ever had.  I really like the way the controls are organized.  Great fast action and low light pictures.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera and kit
Reviews.Author: Traveler
Reviews.Content: Fantastic camera with good specs for the semi-pro, excellent back up gear for the pro photographer. For the amateur photographers, the kit offered is a great value and a good choice. Highly recommended bundle, plus Amazon is a great dependable and professional company, thanks!.

Reviews.Title: Best quality point and shoot with advanced features for the price
Reviews.Author: Alan J Herman
Reviews.Content: I've been an amateur camera enthusiast for 45 years. I've had several Canon SLR film cameras which I loved and then several Leica and Canon point and shoot cameras but I always preferred my Canon A1 SLR for high quality and flexible shooting until I got the new G16. I've had the G16 for 3 months and taken great shots in snowy Michigan and sunny Florida - landscapes, seascapes, botanical gardens, greenhouses, birds, orchid close-ups and portraits. The image quality has been outstanding for all these venues. I've made several enlargements with outstanding quality. Learning to use all the features took several hours but was not difficult. My first instinct was to shoot in Manual mode, but I've found that Auto does as good or better job 80% of the time. For someone who wants a small unobtrusive camera with both point and shoot and manual control, this is a fine product at a decent price.

Reviews.Title: My new G16 is a great choice for an interested amateur!
Reviews.Author: Gregory J. Malley "summervale"
Reviews.Content: As an interested amateur, this camera is excellent for me. As I learn more, this camera will always be able to offer more than I know how to use. Very pleased

Reviews.Title: Handy camera
Reviews.Author: John Grable
Reviews.Content: Camera is Great powerful and light to carryWonderful images and the wi fi makes it easy to share images

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Patrick J Nolan
Reviews.Content: It has great features for a small camera. A lot to study. I t worked very good on auto settings

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot G16
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera.  The first time I used it I took it on a 20 day cruise, and the pictures were fabulous.  The camera was easy to use, and handy when I wore it with the strap around my neck or in my purse for quick use!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot G16 - Ultimate Bundle
Reviews.Author: Daniel R
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera because of Canon’s reputation. The G16 had many favorable customer reviews and this camera had all the features that we were looking for. We are very happy with the picture quality and the macro mode. The fact that it came as a bundle was a big plus.

Reviews.Title: A great affordable and picture quality camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa Ocampo
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It's affordable, great size for travel and the picture quality is great!! I bought this camera bc I usually take photos on my iPhone and realized that I wanted even clearer photos that would not get blurry if I printed or enlarged them. I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: camera good, bundle not worth it
Reviews.Author: camera hobbyist "x"
Reviews.Content: lot of cheap stuff in the bundle.  battery charger comes with the camera anyway.  extra battery is useful, and memory card, but other stuff is questionable.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera and package!
Reviews.Author: Karen Goforth
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera and package! I did a lot of research on cameras of this type prior to my purchase. This camera and the package it came with was the best value by far. Just came back from France and took over 1300 pictures with this camera and all turned out great. I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Awesome package
Reviews.Author: Pablo Gonzaga
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived as described. the G16 is a great camera and all of the accessories is came with are useful. The camera bag is the unsung hero of the accessories group, it's a well made and roomy bag.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and great seller
Reviews.Author: J. Lang
Reviews.Content: I love it! The accessories are not all essential but it does contain many valuable components such as the data card and lens cleaning kit.

Reviews.Title: Stoked with my Canon
Reviews.Author: Philip Clancy
Reviews.Content: Totally stoked! Happy with entire package. The Canon Powershot G16 is the perfect small camera. The wifi works seamlessly with my iPhone 5S.

Reviews.Title: Great camera with outstanding options included. Took it to Italy and was impressed with its versatility and ease of use.
Reviews.Author: Gloria Ewing
Reviews.Content: The camera was outstanding, and coupled with the included options made a real winner. The 32 gig card was invaluable for our trip to Italy where we took memorable pictures from daylight until well after dark. The low light feature allowed us to take pictures in locations where flash photography was not permitted. Those pictures came great as well.

Reviews.Title: Great macro capability
Reviews.Author: Lily
Reviews.Content: Macros are superb on this camera.  Get excellent shallow depth of field which I love.  The camera is also easy to use.  This is my go to camera for macro shots bar none.

Reviews.Title: The Ultimate Brack Friday Bunduru
Reviews.Author: Mahesh Madhav
Reviews.Content: This is the ultimate holiday bundle! The camera alone costs $549 retail, and is on sale for $499 for the weekend. Everything else that comes in the bunduru is absolutely free! That must be over $60 free stuff total. Definitely worth it.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor
1080p/60p Full HD video
5x Optical Zoom
High Speed AF
ISO 12800
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot G16 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 1080p Full-HD Video Ultimate Bundle With 32GB Secure Digital High Speed Memory Card, Digpro Deluxe Case, Extra Battery, Card Reader, Tripod , Card Wallet , HDMI Cable , Screen Pro
